list_definition.definition: a type of apparatus for heating a room.
an apparatus in a car which, with a fan, cools the engine.

list_ex_of_english: Before we describe the experiments with spectral data in detail, we mention the model of a blackbody radiator.
In the first model it was assumed that the cooling power of the radiator is fixed.
To expand the hohlraum design choices, we have presented two new designs: a hybrid target and a large-angle, distributed radiator target.
The rover body sidewalls must provide sufficient area for thermal radiators.
Thermal radiators are 1 mm thick aluminium sheets with heat pipes mounted onto their internal faces.
We have also designed two new hohlraums: a "hybrid" target and a large-angle, distributed radiator target.
Design of a distributed radiator target for inertial fusion driven from two sides with heavy ion beams.
For the first time, an entire pathway from beginning to end is outlined for fabrication of a high-gain, distributed radiator target.
